parse.title: Timeline of national flags

text.*:
This article does not cite any sources. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. (October 2014) (Learn how and when to remove this template message)

This page contains a list of flags and/or modifications made on the flags of current sovereign nations since the year 1000

Contents

  • 1 Africa
  • 2 Asia
  • 3 Europe
  • 4 North America
  • 5 South America
  • 6 Oceania
